Specimen Container(s): Plastic screw-cap tube with conical bottom
Sterile swab (PurFlock Ultra Flock Swab, Foam Swab)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Azer Scientific Universal Transport Medium, a culture-based medium for collection and transport of upper respiratory specimens containing viruses.
Indications for Use Summary: For collection and transport of upper respiratory clinical specimens containing respiratory viruses from the collection site to the testing laboratory, for subsequent isolation and detection of upper respiratory viruses including Influenza A, Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV), and Adenovirus.
